Title: Relates to mandatory training for treasurers of political committees
Summary: Provides for mandatory training for treasurers of political committees once every three years; requires treasurers to complete such training within forty-five days after first being appointed; requires the state board of elections to provide such training in any method it determines, as well as a web-based format; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to providing for mandatory training curriculum for treasurers of political committees
